channel.title: Shops?
channel.description:
Ok i added a shop and everything but when i trade it disconects me and i get this error in my runserver box.
LOADED: 1 [client-1-blaine]: Loading finished. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -82 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17984) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16766) at client.packetSending(client.java:16719) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:49) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player blaine ClientHandler: Client blaine disconnected. Connection accepted from BLAINE: 2183.
